Invasive Species Compendium: The table includes species that are invasive in this region, those for which there is no data on invasive status, and also species that are not invasive in the region but are reported as invasive elsewhere. This summary table is based on all the information available.When several references are cited, they may give conflicting information on the distribution record.Further confirmation should be sought before use. Records are included from full and basic datasheets.
